short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to limit the number of visits per day or the duration of each visit to any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Limit your time spent on distracting sites. Limit is an extension that allows you to set time limits for distracting websites.

When you control your time on distracting websites, youâ€™ll find you have far more time to focus on the things that matter most.

To use Limit, simply enter the websites you find distracting and choose a daily time limit. For example, you could limit yourself to ten minutes a day on Facebook, or half an hour a day on Duolingo.


- You can add or delete any website from the list of sites 
- Open source and free to use.
- Your data not saved, your privacy is ensured.
- Add features as your own wishes.

LiLimit is a product by Yoni Shieber, in order to improve the well-being alongside user's privacy, and contributing the open source committee.
Learn more about the project: github.com/jonis100/LiLimit

The main idea come from my expending too much time on Linkedin. That is the reason of the name. 

I hope you find LiLimit to be a simple and useful tool for developing healthier online habits and routines.
